A Emoji

üÖ∞Ô∏è, officially named A Button (Blood Type), is one of the many emojis on the Internet. Its primary design consists of the A letter on a red background. A Button (Blood Type) was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 with code point ‚ÄúU+1F170‚Äù in 2010 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

In the context of NekoCulture, it is one of the earliest Kit memes, introduced in December 20231, along with Kit Moments. Initially regarded by Kit as a ‚Äúshouting emoji‚Äù, the A Button emoji has since became popular among Kit Fans, and over time variations of it have been made by Kit and others.
